title: Am I the only one who finds the video game industry stale as fuck rn?
body:
I go on twitch to find something interesting, we got 2 mobas on the top 10 most viewed. 

League and Dota both very good games but Iv had my four years of it. 

We got two battle royale games, fun ish but honestly too simple to tame my mind for a long time.

We got over watch fun game but two years old now and I haven't put enough time on it. 

and then we have csgo. 

So essentially the most popular games right now are Mobas, BR, and FPS's. 

Where are all the other creative and fun games I grew up with, why are their no original ideas anymore? 
Just everyone milking the shooter Cash cow. Shooters are not fun anymore in my opinion. 

Someone help me I can't find anything even half decent to play.
